meanings.definition: A liquid food made by boiling meat, fish, or vegetables in water.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat soups when it's cold outside.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious soups for dinner every Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The soups at the restaurant were so hot, they fogged up my glasses!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in making soups is like a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of grandma's soups always brings back fond memories.

meanings.definition: To increase the power or effectiveness of something.
meanings.sent1: Adding more spices can really soups up the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent2: He decided to soups up his car by installing a turbocharger.
meanings.sent3: The magician soupsed up his magic trick with a dazzling light show.
meanings.sent4: She soupsed up her presentation with engaging visuals and interactive elements.
meanings.sent5: The new software update really soups up the performance of the computer.
